text.__SUMMARY__: Margaritaria nobilis, also known as bastard hogberry, is a fruit-bearing plant found in Mexico, Central America, South America, and the West Indies.The fruit is a bright iridescent blue color, resulting from a complex surface structure which interferes with light waves.
